Posts.EditableText:
odd. now that i'm home, i can access the site just fine!  It must be the stupid web blocker thing that they're now using at school.

[EDIT] I tried it, and it obviously does it on a word by word basis, not a character by character basis.  So if you type in something like 007bond rulz, it comes out with "07BOND RULZ".  It isn't very good at all.  If u type in little, u get "LITILE".  Sorry, but that thing is crap.

Posts.EditableText:
If you use Miranda IM or Gaim, I believe they both have plugins developed by different people that provide a similar effect without having to open a bookmark, type, submit, copy, close browser, paste.

The Miranda IM plugin I believe is called Kiddy Script, the Gaim plugin I'm not sure of the title.
